item.description:
The War 1939 – 1945 Expansion Kit offers twelve new scenarios, including 3 alternative history scenarios:

 "A Road Not Taken" (Hitler does not declare war on the U.S.in 1941)
 "Lord Halifax’s Treaty" (Britain makes a deal with Germany in summer 1940 after losing the BEF at Dunkirk)
 "The virtue of vigilance" (Britain and France rearm early enough tobe ready for war in 1939)




The other 9 scenarios are historical or near historical:

 Battle of Britain
 Operation Sealion (the never-executed invasion of Britain)
 Arctic convoy
 Kursk
 Stalingrad
 Bombing the Reich
 Clandestine war
 Italian campaign
 Operation Tannenbaum (the never-executed invasion of Switzerland in 1940)




A 38-page optional rule book, which introduces such new concepts as Hidden Buildups (which allow Bulge-style strategic surprise); variable French and Soviet Surprise rules (for 1940 and 1941, respectively); new Diplomatic targets and strategies; solitaire Diplomatic rules; a much more robust Spain; expanded SS recruiting, Hiwis, Brandenburgers and 49 (!) new variants.
Two new counter sheets, enabling players to operationalize the new scenarios, optional rules and Variants.

Components:

 2 full sheets of 5/8” counters
 3 sop cards
 1 sequence of play booklet – there is an SOP for each of the 12 new scenarios
 1 optional rules booklet
 1 scenario booklet
 1 full color box and lid – the big 3” deep box




(adapted from the publisher's description and back of the box)
